title: Reliable kenken app.
comment: Interface is just a little clunky but don't let that stop you from playing this excellent version of kenken.
The best KenKen by far

title: Fantastic game
comment: I've tried a few kenken games on the android platform and this is, by a wide margin, the best. The user experience is exactly what this game calls for -- everything is intuitive, nothing really takes longer to accomplish than it needs to. Also I love that the options are offered to turn on and off mistake highlighting, pencil-mark auto-removal. Most amazing, the ability to a) generate puzzles even when data is not available (some apps need to download them) and b) the option of no-op puzzles -- the combination of these has been a really pleasurable distraction on subway rides for the last three years. That's a long time. It holds up. Thank you.
I have a lot of fun playing this game.

title: Holoken is clean and awesome
comment: It starts easy with each new level and then gets harder and harder.

title: Thank you so much
comment: This is a great app. I play all the time. Of the various mathdoku apps I've tried on Google Play this is by far the best and you sure can't beat free!

title: Great App
comment: Probably the best kenken game on mobile phone ever

title: Favorite
comment: My favorite of this kind of number puzzle, and I've tried a bunch of them.
Awesome, but it's sorta ruining my life, too. More addictive than cigarettes.

title: Favorite app for this game.  I had tried several others and this one is the best!  Thank you to the developers, great job!
Great game
comment: Lots of features, small size, and doesn't take much battery. Endless fun. Definitely recommend.

title: Love it!
comment: Just wish statistics kept track of how many matches were won/played for each board size.

title: Great Game
comment: Lots of fun.
Love it!

title: Nice game
comment: It has some faulty scoring system that should be corrected. If we restart the puzzle , time should not be resetted. It should only be resetted with new puzzle. It currently serve as hack for low time register.

title: Don't Download!
comment: Constant crashing and hanging my phone make this app completely useless (or worse). I love KenKen, but will now download a different version. Terrible!

title: Addicted
comment: Its bad.... I can't stop
New favorite casual game!

title: Great app but
comment: Look I love the organisation and play of this game. The statistics info is poorly done though. Sometimes when I take a call or switch to another app or even leave phone on charge overnight the play time keeps ticking over. So the play time for the game may go from 2:20 to 5:14:20. Then this blows out the statistics.  Could obvious outliers such as this be removed from the statistics recorded.

title: Horrible interface and poor controls
comment: horrible execution. No way to highlight entire cage to pencil something in, have to"stamp"each cell individually.  Stamping also gets very annoying with it automatically penciling\penning a cell if you touch it and it's the only number. Very much a nuisance even if you have the "select cell first" enabled the game thinks it is being smart by doing this for you. It's not. Shame too cause would be great otherwise..Google play needs a good kenken app as the other top rated one has so few 7x7 and more puzzles

title: Great game
comment: This is the best implementation of the "KenKen" game type I've seen.  It is thoroughly addictive-- it requires good math skills and great logic. You just want to keep playing and playing and playing.  It's my favorite Android game!

title: Good
comment: Reset statistics button is unnecessarily large

title: Works great
comment: Thanks!  Game interface was intuitive and works great on Note 3.  Usually avoid free apps due to ads but I didn't see any which is very generous.  A good and comprehensive KenKen.   Cheers!

title: Not bad
comment: The interface is fine but the puzzles aren't as good as others I've seen. The single squares need to be eliminated as this makes them too easy. Differeing levels of difficulty (within the sizes) would be a great improvemnt as they ars currently just random.

title: 9x9 looks awesome on GNOTE2
comment: Thnx to the people who give it away for free ;-)
Excellent UI, much better than Mathdoku.

title: Better than alternative
comment: After Mathdoku app recent upgrade, I installed this. I wish I had looked into it earlier. Great app, simple, and fun!
Challenging and fun

title: Kenken lover
comment: Love it.

title: I was enjoying this game very much
comment: and would have given it five stars. But then I got interrupted in the middle of a game and put it down, and when I came back two hours later the display was still on and the battery run down considerably. My phone is set to turn the display off after a few minutes of inactivity, so I can only think that this app has overridden that.  I can't always remember to turn the display off when I put the phone down, so sadly I have uninstalled this game.  UPDATE: thanks for clarifying, I will reinstall the game. Changing my rating.

Hi Deborah, yes the app has the capability to leave the screen on, but *only* if the preference to "Keep screen on" is set in your display options under Settings. By default, this is set to 'off', and can only be changed by the user. Best regards.

title: bloody fantastic
comment: I love it.

title: Great game.
comment: No ads, few required permissions. Better interface than Mathdoku v.2

title: Nice
comment: Good. Particularly since MathDoku screwed up their interface to make it unplayable.

title: Amazing
comment: Everything you could ask for in this type of game

comment: Does everything I want it to do. Fast and stable.

title: Love it.
comment: Looks great and does everything I want.

title: Great game

title: Great game.
comment: I have no complaints.

title: Phone freeze
comment: The first time I went to use it my phone froze to the point where I had to take out the battery to restart. I hate apps that freeze my phone. Uninstalled.

title: Very addictive
comment: Nice layout and you can change the colour scheme to black so it's easier on the eyes

title: Best kenken app
comment: Best kenken game by far. I believe the top left button is broken.

title: 5 of 6 stars
comment: One minor flaw and a comment. The flaw -- I have yet to see a 9x9 puzzle that does not start with 4 solved cells. The comment -- I believe this app could be made more accessible to those with marginal eyesight by displaying the math for the currently selected cage between the question mark and the menu icon.

title: A lot of fun!
comment: Ken Ken just got a lot easier to play! Holoken is great in that it offers (seemingly)  unlimited puzzles at all levels, integrating into its ui a really nice,  clean way to do pencil marks. I'm still playing,  after 3 months

title: Really enjoyable
comment: This is a nice break from the sudoku puzzles.
Getting my nerd on

title: Nice work
comment: I am hooked on Mathdoku. I just got a new phone so I figured I'd try out the alternative variants. This one is the best so far. Look and feel, gui are nicer but biggest improvement for me is Stats with times. Thx

title: Pls fix
comment: I need the old one, my grid is too small when I play 8x8, but the number buttons re too big, pls fix

title: Excellent
comment: My only suggestion would be to prevent me from adding pencil marks which conflict with existing pen marks, as an option.

title: great :D
comment: I love this

title: It's great but
comment: Very good implementation of kenken. Recommended.  The way to operate some things are not very intuitive. it took me some time to get used with the way to set numbers or mark possible numbers. The latest update made the numpad bigger and the actual puzzle area smaller! this is terrible! maybe unnoticeable for tablet users but I'm on galaxy note and the screen isn't that big, so it makes a difference.

title: Addicted Player
comment: Super brain teaser

comment: This is a great game. The only problem is that when I turn my phone on its side, the numbers do not appear. It is blank, but awesome job!

title: Nice
comment: Nice app bug gets updated too often so have to uninstall.
Good puzzles

title: nothing to complain about…
comment: The dark theme in 1.0.3 is more "readable". Thank you, developer! Kudos also go to the developer of MathDoku!

title: Amazing

title: Good version
comment: Pencil/pen selection would be better as a toggle rather than separate buttons. It would also be nice if the statistics tracked average times as well. Lastly, if penning in a number in a row removed the penciled in numbers in the same row/column.
Great
